subject: Medicine
title: What Is a Mutation?
description: One-minute skill: What Is a Mutation?.

hook.text: A mutation is simply a change in a DNA sequence.

buildup.text: Each time a cell copies DNA, tiny errors can slip in.

discovery.text: Most mutations are harmless or get repaired automatically.

twist.text: Some rare mutations give a survival advantage.

climax.text: Beneficial mutations are the engine of evolution over time.

punchline.text: Typos in DNA drive all of evolution.

quiz.question: What is a mutation?
options: A change in a DNA sequence
